001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import com.google.gson.Gson;
005import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
006import dagger.Module;
007import dagger.Provides;
008import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
010import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service.ZoomApiProxy;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service.ZoomAuthProxy;
013import javax.inject.Singleton;
014import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
015import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
016import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
017import retrofit2.Retrofit;
018import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
019import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
020
021@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
022@Module
023public final class ZoomModule {
024
025  @Singleton
026  @Provides
027  ZoomAuthProxy buildAuthProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
028    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
029        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
030        .create();
031    HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor().setLevel(Level.BODY);
032    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
033        .addInterceptor(interceptor)
034        .build();
035    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
036        .baseUrl("https://zoom.us/")
037        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
038        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
039        .client(client)
040        .build();
041    return retrofit.create(ZoomAuthProxy.class);
042  }
043
044  @Singleton
045  @Provides
046  ZoomApiProxy buildApiProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
047    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
048        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
049        .setDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd")
050        .create();
051    HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor().setLevel(Level.BODY);
052    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
053        .addInterceptor(interceptor)
054        .build();
055    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
056        .baseUrl("https://api.zoom.us/v2/")
057        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
058        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
059        .client(client)
060        .build();
061    return retrofit.create(ZoomApiProxy.class);
062  }
063}
